CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 拍摄；射击；（使朝某方向）冲；奔；扑；射；飞驰；射杀；发射；射门；开（枪或其他武器）；打猎；射伤；剧痛跳窜；突然把…投向；（在整场比赛中）击出…杆；玩；打（某种游戏）
嫩枝；新芽；新枝；苗；射击；拍摄
哎呀（表示惊讶或失望）；呸（表示轻蔑）；去吧（表示鼓励或无所谓的态度）；什么（表示怀疑）；（让某人把话说出来）说吧；请讲

synonym.mean: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的
射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指植物或灌木刚长出的新枝、嫩枝或嫩芽。
指主枝或粗大强壮的枝。
普通用词，泛指树木比bough小一些的大枝或小枝，也可用于引申意义。

word_group.brief_definition: 拿报信人出气(而非责备问题的责任人), 将怨气发在报坏消息者身上
易如反掌；探囊取物；手到擒来
word_group.phrase: be like shooting fish in a barrel

bilingual.source: He forgot to bring his tripod to the shoot.
bilingual.target: 他忘了带三脚架去拍摄。

bilingual.source: The film crew is getting ready to shoot.
bilingual.target: 电影的全体人员正在准备拍摄。

bilingual.source: The setups for the photo shoot were very elaborate.
He bought a new drone to shoot videos.
bilingual.target: 他买了一架新的无人机来拍摄视频。

bilingual.source: The set-ups for the photo shoot were very elaborate.
He likes to shoot landscape photos during holidays.
bilingual.target: 他喜欢在假期拍摄风景照片。

bilingual.source: This camera can shoot 60 frames per second.
bilingual.target: 这台相机可以拍摄60帧每秒的视频。

bilingual.source: You need to buy more film to finish the shoot.
bilingual.target: 你需要购买更多的胶片来完成拍摄。

bilingual.source: I like to shoot videos with a high definition camera.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢用高清摄像机拍摄视频。

bilingual.source: The photo shoot was staged to look spontaneous.
bilingual.target: 这次拍摄是策划的，看起来像是自发的。

list.abstract: shoot（英 [ʃuːt]，美 [ʃuːt]），英语单词，作动词为射死；射伤；射中。作名词为嫩枝；狩猎；拍摄。短语搭配有shoot up（注射毒品）。例句为“Activities include a weekly rifle shoot（活动包括每周一次的步枪射击比赛）”。 shoot相关近义词有flight、pot等。

yingyinNormal.en: Now that I think about it maybe we should crash the shoot anyway and see who they replace me with, make fun of the skinny bitch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在想也许我们该冲到拍摄现场看看是谁代替了我，去取笑一下那个苗条的小婊子。

yingyinNormal.en: Take it. Shoot the dog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿着。开枪把狗打死。

yingyinNormal.en: Shoot it again. I think I blinked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们再来一次吧，我觉得我眨眼了。

yingyinNormal.en: What the...! She tried to shoot me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我靠！她刚才拿枪指着我。

yingyinNormal.en: This weapon is live. Shoot the dog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 枪已上膛。开枪把狗打死。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, don't shoot him yet. Okay? Just…
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，别再向他开枪了好吗？我们应该…

yingyinNormal.en: They'll never shoot down a head of state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不会把一国元首打下来的。

yingyinNormal.en: I will shoot forth the lasers from my eyeballs!
yingyinNormal.zh: 释放破坏死光了！

yingyinNormal.en: It's called a bullet. You shoot people with them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这叫子弹，朝人开枪时用的。

yingyinNormal.en: Take him. They come one step closer, shoot me. Stop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抓住他。他们再靠近一步，就朝我开枪。停下。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't shoot anybody point blank, let alone my friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能就这么对人开枪，何况是我的朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: A retard? Well, shoot, that ought to tell you something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 智障？你也该看出来一些事吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Make your goodbyes and shoot him. Shoot him. What? Shoot Dr Watson.
yingyinNormal.zh: 道别，开枪吧。开枪！什么？冲华生医生开枪。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Oh. Shoot. Oh shoot. Rachel wanted to see this tape. What is it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 快点，瑞秋想看这卷录影带。那是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Baskets! They shoot baskets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 篮球，他们打篮球。

yingyinNormal.en: Sixteenth-sies. Shoot yourselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是十六分之一。去屎吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Shoot. What am I gonna do? Well, I could do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那怎么办？我可以帮。

yingyinNormal.en: Would I be completely out of line to ask you to shoot him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我请求你枪毙了他也不算太过分吧？

yingyinNormal.en: We got one good target, gentlemen. Do not shoot my Raptors. Please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只有一个目标，先生们，不要伤了我的迅猛龙，拜托了。

yingyinNormal.en: Any painful gas? No. Shoot, Dr. Schiff what kind of question is that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 放屁会不舒服吗？不会，辛夫医生，那是哪门子的问题？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

word_family.mean: v. 为...装子弹；制造弹药；射死；射伤；射中；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

sense_info_list.en: strike with a projectile from a bow or gun

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 射手；枪手；炮手；射击运动员；投篮者；射门者；擦地球；一客酒；手枪；掷骰子者
v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

word_family.mean: v. 为...装子弹；制造弹药；射死；射伤；射中；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

sense_info_list.en: strike with a projectile from a bow or gun

examination_example.sentence: A shock wave <highlight>shoots</highlight> through your whole system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 冲击波会穿透你的整个身体。

examination_example.sentence: For years, nutritionists have recommended that pasta be kept to a minimum, to cut calories, prevent fat build-up and stop blood sugar <highlight>shooting</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，营养学家一直建议尽量少吃意大利面，以减少卡路里，防止脂肪堆积并阻止血糖上升。

examination_example.sentence: The experiment is based upon the idea that farmers would <highlight>shoot</highlight> and kill lions in an effort to protect their livestock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个实验是基于这样一种想法，即农民会射杀狮子来保护他们的家畜。

examination_example.sentence: They will be able to determine if their psychological trickery will work to help keep farmers from <highlight>shooting</highlight> lions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将能够确定他们的心理诡计是否有助于阻止农民射杀狮子。

sense_info_list.en: a stem or branch of a plant especially when young or just beginning to grow

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 射手；枪手；炮手；射击运动员；投篮者；射门者；擦地球；一客酒；手枪；掷骰子者
v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

examination_example.sentence: "Part of the reason to <highlight>shoot</highlight> there is that it's new and nice. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去那里拍摄的部分原因是那里很新很漂亮。

examination_example.sentence: Part of the reason to <highlight>shoot</highlight> there is that it's new and nice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在松岛新城拍摄的部分原因在于，那里很新很漂亮。

examination_example.sentence: It is where many American movies are <highlight>shot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多美国电影都是在这里拍摄的。

sense_info_list.en: strike with a projectile from a bow or gun

examination_example.sentence: An officer then <highlight>shot</highlight> an arrow to put it to sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后一名军官射了一箭，让它睡着了。

examination_example.sentence: It was <highlight>shot</highlight> to death by a police officer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它被一名警察开枪打死。

examination_example.sentence: As two months ago, a young man was <highlight>shot</highlight> just down the street.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两个月前，一个年轻人在街上被枪杀。

examination_example.sentence: People have grown taller over the last century, with South Korean women <highlight>shooting</highlight> up by more than 20cm on average.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的一个世纪里，人类长高了，韩国女性的平均身高增加了20多厘米。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 冲; 奔; 扑; 射

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

word_family.mean: v. 为...装子弹；制造弹药；射死；射伤；射中；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

sense_info_list.zh: 冲; 奔; 扑; 射

examination_example.sentence: Then Jeff noticed steam <highlight>shooting</highlight> out of the pot and the lid (盖子) starting to shake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，杰夫注意到蒸汽从锅里喷出，锅盖开始摇晃。

examination_example.sentence: One more look and he noticed flames <highlight>shooting</highlight> out from under the disabled vehicle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他又看了一眼，发现那辆坏了的车下面冒出了火焰。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, they were <highlight>shot</highlight> from 1914 through 1916, by a cameraman who had no reasonable expectation of survival.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，它们是在1914到1916年间，由一个对生存没有任何合理期望的摄影师拍摄的。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, they were <highlight>shot</highlight> from 1914 through 1916, most of them after a disastrous shipwreck (海滩), by a cameraman.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上这组照片是由一名摄影师在1914年至1916年之间照的，其中大部分都是在一场海难之后。

examination_example.sentence: Summers in the mid-70s were spent at home <highlight>shooting</highlight> baskets, hitting a baseball, or throwing a football.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 七十年代中期的夏天，我要么在家投篮，要么打棒球，要么踢足球。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 开枪; 射击; 发射

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 射手；枪手；炮手；射击运动员；投篮者；射门者；擦地球；一客酒；手枪；掷骰子者
n. 射；射击；枪杀；狩猎权；狩猎场
v. 射死；射伤；射中；急速移动；射门；投篮；将…转向；拍摄；发芽；长苗；注射；准确刨平

word_family.mean: v. 为...装子弹；制造弹药；射死；射伤；射中；（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

sense_info_list.en: to fire a gun or other weapon; to fire something from a weapon
sense_info_list.zh: 开枪; 射击; 发射

examination_example.sentence: After Hou Yi <highlight>shot</highlight> down the nine suns, everything began to grow on the earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后羿射下九个太阳后，地球上的万物开始生长。

examination_example.sentence: In 2012, she was <highlight>shot</highlight> and seriously injured when she returned home on the school bus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2012年，她在乘坐校车回家时遭受了枪击，受了重伤。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>shot</highlight> some of the birds and hung them up near the corn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我射杀了一些鸟，并把它们挂在玉米附近。

examination_example.sentence: Only the two top leaves and bud (芽) of each new <highlight>shoot</highlight> are picked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个新芽只有顶部的两片叶子和芽被采摘。

examination_example.sentence: Four days after landing, a tiny cotton <highlight>shoot</highlight> showed that they do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 落地四天后，一个小小的棉花芽展示了它们确实如此。

examination_example.sentence: When plants <highlight>shoot</highlight> on the earth, their stems grow away from the gravity, and so they always <highlight>shoot</highlight> upwards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当植物在地球上发芽时，它们的茎远离重力而生长，所以它们总是向上发芽。

examination_example.sentence: The film, <highlight>shot</highlight> in the cold wilderness of Iceland, shows just how hard life can be in the Arctic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这部影片拍摄于冰岛寒冷的荒野中，显示了北极地区艰难的生活。

examination_example.sentence: Where was the movie Arctic (2019) <highlight>shot</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电影《北极》（2019）是在哪里拍摄的？

examination_example.sentence: We waited for hours for the scene to be <highlight>shot</highlight>, and then went in and out of the building about fifty times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们等了几个小时才拍完这一幕，然后在楼里进进出出了大约50次。
